original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sīsappacālakaṁ antaraghare gacchanti sīsaṁ olambentā …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sīsappacālakam antara ghare gacchanti sīsam olambentā pe
na sīsappacālakam antaraghare gamissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sīsappacālakaṁ antaraghare gacchati sīsaṁ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca sīsappacālakam antaraghare gacchati sīsam olambento āpatti dukkaṭassa
